radiographic_examinations.findings: Massive splenomegaly with multiple well-defined echogenic lesions throughout the splenic parenchyma. No features suggested vesicular lithiasis or signs of portal hypertension.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Contrast-enhanced computed tomography (CECT) of the abdomen
radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple hypointense lesions in the spleen, most likely splenic infarcts, without evidence of lymphadenopathy.
